properties.name: Clark Park and Green Line Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Merrylg Green Lin has excelent coffee and tea. Clark Park is nice for strolling and great if you havea dog. Walknig along 43rd and down Pine (or any street here) is nice for seeing the Victorian architecture.

properties.name: Fitler's Square and Schuykill Banks Park
properties.description: Posted by Merrylgphiladelphia paNice area for walking. The park runs along the Schuykill River, up to the Art Museum and connects up with Kelly Drive.

properties.name: Independence Mall
properties.description: Posted by Merrylg  philadelphia, paHere they sat to sign the Constitution and now you\'ll also find the Constitution Center. Tour buildings, nice federal furniture and interesting politics. Good old liberty bell as well. Seated in park are story tellers. Washington Sq. Park is pretty as well.

properties.name: North 3rd Street
properties.description: Posted by Merrylgnorth 3rd st. philadelphia paGreat shopping on N. 3rd between Market and Race. 2nd is also good and leads to Elfrith\'s Alley. Amazing ice cream, Ben Franklin\'s Parlor on 2nd and Market. Fork (Market and 4th) has amazing food. Seranno on 2nd off of Market is also excellent.

properties.name: Our House
properties.description: Posted by Merrylg910 S. 47th St. 19143910 S. 47th. Between Baltimore and Springfield (on the corner 47th and Windsor). Line 34 on the the trolly.

properties.name: Reading Terminal Market
properties.description: Posted by MerrylgN. 13th st. Philadelphia, PAGreat place for grocery or snack shopping. Amish come in daily to sell local produce, dairy, and meats.

properties.name: Rittenhouse Square
properties.description: Posted by Merrylgrittenhouse sq, philadelphia, paNice shopping area. Di Bruno Brothers is a great place for take out sandwiches to be eaten in the park. Audrey Claire is a great local produce restaurant. Good burgers and views at Rouge.

properties.name: Society Hill
properties.description: Posted by Merrylg philadelphia paGreat walking area. 18th century houss, lots of nice alleys, good homeware shopping on Pine around 13th st.

properties.name: Start of the U of Penn Campus
properties.description: Posted by MerrylgNice for strolling. Some cafes and restuarants as well.

properties.name: Vietien Restuarant
properties.description: Posted by Merrylg47th St and Baltimore Ave. PhiladelphiaAmazing Loatian/Thai food

properties.name: Wedding Ceremony and Reception
properties.description: Posted by MerrylgChamounix Drive PhiladelphiaRidgeland Mansion + The Wellness Community of Philadelphia. The First right turn after turning onto Chamounix Drive.
